# Question 1
```{r}
x <- 1.1
a <- 2.2
b <- 3.3

# a
z <- x^a^b

# b
z <- (x^a)^b

# c
z <- 3*(x^3)+2*(x^2)+1
```

# Question 2
```{r}
# a
z <- c(seq(1:8), seq(7:1))
print(z)

# b
z <- rep(x=seq(1:5), times=seq(1:5))
print(z)

# c
z <- rep(x=seq(5,1), times=seq(1,5))
print(z)
```

# Question 3
```{r}
x <- runif(2)
print(x)

r <- sqrt(x[1]^2 + x[2]^2)
theta <- atan(x[2]/x[1])

coords <- c(r,theta)
print(coords)
```

# Question 4
```{r}

queue <- c("sheep", "fox", "owl", "ant")
print(queue)

# a
queue <- c(queue, "serpent")
print(queue)

# b
queue <- queue[-1]
print(queue)

# c
queue <- c("donkey", queue)
print(queue)

# d
queue <- queue[-c(length(queue))]
print(queue)

# e
queue <- queue[-c(3)]
print(queue)

# f
queue <- c(queue[1:2], "aphid", queue[3])
print(queue)

# g 
print(which(queue == "aphid"))
```

# Question 5
```{r}
num <- seq(1:100)

which(num %% 2 & num %% 3 & num %% 7)
```
